name: Snoot Game
description:
The Pre-historic Romance a million years in MS Paint to tell.

You play as Anon, a lonely, faceless, nobody, reject who finds himself in the dinosaur themed acid trip of a school named Volcano High. Here Anon meets the qt ptero known as Fang and their clown-vomit colored posse of reject friends and other associated thorns-in-the-side. All of whom, you can read about here: https://snootgame.xyz/characters.html
